summary: The package implements Python models of numerous Windows DCOM interfaces—including COM+ Event System, OLE Automation, Volume Shadow Copy Service, Virtual Disk Service, and Windows Management Instrumentation—allowing clients to encode, decode, and invoke these interfaces remotely over DCE/RPC.
business_intent: Enable security professionals and automation tools to interact with, enumerate, and manipulate Windows system components remotely for testing, diagnostics, and management purposes.
